answers.answer: Hi,How are you?White matter dots can be due to chronic headaches, migraine, old age, stroke, diabetes, long standing high BP, chronic alcoholism, Alzheimer’s disease and MS.How old are you?Since you do not have any neurological symptoms these can be due to normal ageing or chronic headaches if high BP and diabetes have been ruled out.Take care!

question: iv recently had a brain scan and it as shown i have a number of white matter dots  but its not clear whether they are vascular or inflammatory , what dose this mean its not going to cause me any problems is it
title: white matter dots
